decision_conditions: The works hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this consent.Reason: As required by Section 18 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

Any damage to the building caused by or during the course of the carrying out of the work permitted shall be made good within 3 months of the completion of the development, in accordance with a specification agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority. Reason: To safeguard the character and appearance of the Listed Building in accordance with policy CS8 of the Core Strategy, development management policies DM10 and DM12 and policy HC1 of the London Plan (2021).

description: Installation of a wall-mounted automated external defibrillator (AED) unit in a high visibility robust cabinet, connected to a mains 240v supply and also incorporating a 120 - 240v AC powered heater and internal LED lighting.
